hamhacks.module.fly.mode.tooltip:
Default: Just the normal fly
Vanilla: Prevents you from being kicked on vanilla servers
Jetpack: Fly like you're wearing a jetpack
hamhacks.module.fly.smoothMovement.toolt: Makes your movement like in bedrock edition
hamhacks.module.trap.tooltip: Traps the nearest player in obsidian
hamhacks.module.encase.tooltip:
Places obsidian around you to protect yourself
from crystals
hamhacks.module.crystalAura.tooltip:
Places and breaks end crystals to kill
your opponents
hamhacks.module.noFall.mode.tooltip:
Packet: Sends a packet to the server saying that you're on the ground
Fly Spoof: Sends a packet saying you are flying
§cWARNING: Fly Spoof can be inconsistent
hamhacks.module.aimbot.fov.tooltip: The FOV within which it will detect entities
hamhacks.module.aimbot.keepAiming.toolti:
Should the Aimbot keep aiming at the entity
you last looked at
hamhacks.module.boatFly.tooltip: Allows boats and other rideable entities to fly
hamhacks.module.autoElytra.tooltip: Toggles your elytra (even if you dont have any)
hamhacks.module.speed.inAirMultiplier.to: Speed multiplier when you're in the air
hamhacks.module.speed.onIceMultiplier.to: Speed multiplier when you're on ice
hamhacks.module.speed.inTunnelMultiplier: Speed multiplier when you're under a block
Speed multiplier when you're touching water
hamhacks.module.jesus.tooltip: Allows you to walk on water like a god
hamhacks.module.killAura.tooltip: Attacks entities within a set range
hamhacks.module.hud.tooltip: Displays info on your screen while ingame
hamhacks.module.tracers.tooltip:
Traces a line from your crosshair
to entities in the world
hamhacks.module.instantKillBow.tooltip:
Makes your arrows fly at light speed
§cWARNING: Uses a lot of saturation/hunger
hamhacks.module.instantKillBow.iteration:
How many times should the module update
your position (might cause kicks from some servers)
hamhacks.module.fullBright.tooltip: Increases your brightness so you can see better
hamhacks.module.fullBright.smoothTransit: Should the transition be smooth when enabling/disabling this module
hamhacks.module.antiBan.tooltip:
Attempts to prevent you from being
banned from multiplayer by Mojang
§cWARNING: Does not bypass any form of ban
hamhacks.module.antiBan.joinEnforcedServ:
Should you automatically join servers
that enforce chat signing
(Joining servers with enforced chat signing disables the module)
hamhacks.module.chat.tooltip: Allows you to customize your chat
hamhacks.module.chat.pingOnMention.toolt: Notifies you with a sound when you were mentioned in chat
hamhacks.module.chat.highlightUsername.t:
Highlights your username in chat to make it
easier to see
hamhacks.module.chat.highlightUsernameCo: The color of your username in chat
hamhacks.module.chat.hideUnsignedIndicat:
Hides the annoying indicator telling you that
a message is unsigned
hamhacks.module.chat.hideSigningStatus.t:
Hides the status to the left of messages
that tells you if it's signed or not
hamhacks.module.timer.tooltip: Allows you to change the tick rate of your client
hamhacks.module.timer.speed.tooltip: The speed of your client in ticks
hamhacks.module.zoom.initialZoom.tooltip: How far to zoom in when you first press the key
hamhacks.module.zoom.scrollToZoom.toolti: Allows you to zoom in or out with the scroll wheel
hamhacks.module.zoom.linearScrollSpeed.t:
Enabled: Scrolling will increase/decrease zoom by Scroll Speed
Disabled: Scrolling will multiply/divide zoom by Scroll Speed
hamhacks.module.zoom.clampZoom.tooltip:
Should the zoom be clamped to a minimum and maximum
§cWARNING: Weird things happen when you go below 1
hamhacks.module.zoom.adjustSensitivity.t: Adjusts your sensitivity to make it easier to aim when zoomed
hamhacks.module.zoom.smoothZoom.tooltip: Zooming in/out will have a smooth animation when on
hamhacks.module.zoom.animationSpeed.tool: How long should the animation take in seconds
hamhacks.module.zoom.smoothCamera.toolti: Enables the smooth camera option when zoomed
hamhacks.module.zoom.renderHand.tooltip: If enabled, your hand will always be rendered
hamhacks.module.noTelemetry.tooltip: Disables the telemetry that was added by Micro$oft
hamhacks.module.freecam.tooltip: Allows you to explore the world from outside of your body
hamhacks.menu.securedServerWarning.messa:
The server you are trying to connect to enforces a secure connection.
You can connect anyways and risk being reported to Mojang or cancel.
